drawImageCentered

public Surface drawImageCentered(Image img,
                                 float x,
                                 float y)
Description copied from interface: Surface
Draws an image, centered at the specified location. Simply subtracts image.width/2 from dx and image.height/2 from dy.

Specified by:
drawImageCentered in interface Surface
